page.title: 19LEISURE AND RECREATION.
page.content:
We did a survey at our local shopping centre about leisure and recreation.We found the most popular pastimes of males are{reading,TV,gardening}and going to{pubs}and{clubs.}The next most popular are{snooker,skittles,DIY, {football,darts,walking,keepfit}and going to{discos.}Not quite so popular are{stamp collecting,fishing,squash, {tennis,badminton,bingo,wine-making, {bird keeping,ballroom dancing,jigsaws, {golf,cricket,running}and the{cinema.}
Females especially liked{reading,TV, {gardening,knitting,}and going to{pubs, {clubs}and{discos.}The next most popular things are{keepfit,badminton, {walking,bingo}and the{cinema.}A few females liked{stamp collecting,squash, {theatre,sewing,jigsaws,cookery, {crosswords,judo,}helping at{Brownies', and doing{voluntary work.}
